text: All motor vehicles and all horse-drawn carriages and buggies owned by the District of Columbia shall be of uniform color and have painted conspicuously thereon, in letters not less than 3 inches high and markedly contrasting in color with the body color of the vehicle, the words, "District of Columbia."
